attrs.name: arrow
attrs.desc: Switch the time when the arrow is displayed. The value of this attribute can be always / hover / never
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is hover.

attrs.name: autoplay
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to perform automatic switchover.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: indicator-position
attrs.desc: Position of the indicator. The optional values of this attribute are outside / none

attrs.name: initial-index
attrs.desc: Index of a slide that is initially activated, starting from 0.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: interval
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 3000.

attrs.name: show-title
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the title.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: trigger
attrs.desc: Indicator triggering mode. The default value is hover. ;The optional value of this attribute is click
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is hover.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Type of the horse-walking lantern; The value of this attribute can be horizontal / vertical / card
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is horizontal.

attrs.name: loop
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.
